wines.description: A distinguished Red Blend showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2021 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of mixed berries and dark fruit, complemented by notes of spice, oak. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of spice. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is balanced and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of layered flavors, integrated tannins. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is harmonious and satisfying, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 45-60 minutes to integrate flavors

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.description: A distinguished Cabernet Sauvignon showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2020 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of blackcurrant and dark cherry, complemented by notes of cedar, tobacco, vanilla. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of cedar. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is bold tannins and full-bodied, delivering flavors of blackberry, dark chocolate, espresso, leather. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and structured, with persistent flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 60-90 minutes to allow complex aromatics to emerge

wineDetails.ageability: Drinking well now through 2030. Can age for 10-15 years from vintage.

wines.productName: Napa Valley Burly Cabernet Sauvignon Special Selection 2022
wines.description: A distinguished Cabernet Sauvignon showcasing Napa Valley terroir. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2022 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of blackcurrant and dark cherry, complemented by notes of cedar, tobacco, vanilla. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of cedar. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is bold tannins and full-bodied, delivering flavors of blackberry, dark chocolate, espresso, leather. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and structured, with persistent flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 60-90 minutes to allow complex aromatics to emerge

wineDetails.ageability: Drinking well now through 2032. Can age for 10-15 years from vintage.

wines.description: A distinguished Pinot Noir showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2023 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of red cherry and strawberry, complemented by notes of raspberry, earthy. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of raspberry. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is silky and medium-bodied, delivering flavors of red fruit, fine tannins, elegant. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is smooth and refined, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed now through 2028. Peak drinking window of 5-8 years.

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.description: A distinguished Riesling showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2023 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of peach and apricot, complemented by notes of honey, petrol, lime. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of honey. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is off-dry to sweet and medium-bodied, delivering flavors of stone fruit, bright acidity, minerality. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is crisp and lingering, with refreshing flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.glassware: Riesling glass or standard white wine glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026. Best enjoyed fresh and vibrant.
